translation: I do not see that this sorrow that burns up my senses would be removed, even if I were to attain prosperous and unrivaled dominion on earth or lordship over the gods.
commentary: 2.8 Not hi not? I see I see? My my? would remove would remove? That that? Shokam grief? Uchchoshanam drying up? of the senses of my senses? unavailable having obtained? Bhumau on the earth? Aspatna unrivaled? Riddham prosperous? kingdom dominion? Suranam over the gods? Even even? f and? lordship lordship.No commentary.
